title: It's Mine
description:
Mercer Mayer's Little Critter is back for one more story, this time about the trials and tribulations of having to share one's toys with siblings.Little Critter is having a rough time with his little brother and sister, who want to play with all of his toys. They both want his things, even though they don't want to share theirs, or have anything else he's interested in in return. Nonetheless, he puts up with it like a champ and at least gets a laugh in the end.
Mercer Mayer's
 
Little Critter
 stories, which address all the major issues of growing up, are perennial favorites to generations of readers of all ages.
author: Gina Mayer
